ARABIC_TEXT: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
TRANSLATION: (1) Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

ARABIC_TEXT: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
TRANSLATION: (2) He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner -

ARABIC_TEXT: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
TRANSLATION: (3) To worship Allāh, fear Him and obey me.

ARABIC_TEXT: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
TRANSLATION: (4) He [i.e., Allāh] will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allāh, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew."

ARABIC_TEXT: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (5) He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

ARABIC_TEXT: فَلَمۡ يَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَآءِيٓ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (6) But my invitation increased them not except in flight [i.e., aversion].

ARABIC_TEXT: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (7) And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments,[1761] persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

ARABIC_TEXT: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (8) Then I invited them publicly.

ARABIC_TEXT: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (9) Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

ARABIC_TEXT: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
TRANSLATION: (10) And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

ARABIC_TEXT: يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (11) He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

ARABIC_TEXT: وَيُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَٰلٖ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَٰرٗا
TRANSLATION: (12) And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

ARABIC_TEXT: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (13) What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allāh [due] grandeur

ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
TRANSLATION: (14) While He has created you in stages?[1762]
FOOTNOTES: [1762]- i.e., in various progressive states and conditions.  See also 22:5 and 23:12-14 in reference to development of the embryo.

ARABIC_TEXT: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا
TRANSLATION: (15) Do you not consider how Allāh has created seven heavens in layers[1763]

ARABIC_TEXT: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا
TRANSLATION: (16) And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

ARABIC_TEXT: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتٗا
TRANSLATION: (17) And Allāh has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

ARABIC_TEXT: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجٗا
TRANSLATION: (18) Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

ARABIC_TEXT: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا
TRANSLATION: (19) And Allāh has made for you the earth an expanse

ARABIC_TEXT: لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا
TRANSLATION: (20) That you may follow therein roads of passage.'"

ARABIC_TEXT: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (21) Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

ARABIC_TEXT: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
TRANSLATION: (22) And they conspired an immense conspiracy

ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
TRANSLATION: (23) And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwāʿ or Yaghūth and Yaʿūq and Nasr.'[1764]
FOOTNOTES: [1764]- These were the names of specific idols named after pious men of earlier generations.

ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
TRANSLATION: (24) And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

ARABIC_TEXT: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا
TRANSLATION: (25) Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allāh [any] helpers.

ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
TRANSLATION: (26) And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

ARABIC_TEXT: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا
TRANSLATION: (27) Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

ARABIC_TEXT: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
TRANSLATION: (28) My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
